title: Pre-existing merge conflicts in server code blocking builds
issue:
Multiple merge conflict markers found in apps/server/src preventing builds:
- socket-handlers.ts (lines 641-667): conflicts between HEAD, origin/agent/tkt-005e, and origin/agent/tkt-004d-paused-org-status
- socket-handlers.test.ts (line 438)
- organization.test.ts (lines 67, 412)
- geolocation.ts (multiple locations)

These conflicts appear to be from incomplete merges of branches tkt-005e and tkt-004d-paused-org-status. The conflicts prevent pnpm build from succeeding.
suggestion:
Human engineer needs to resolve merge conflicts by:
1. Reviewing the conflicting changes from both branches
2. Deciding which implementation to keep or how to merge them
3. Removing all conflict markers (<<<<<<< HEAD, =======, >>>>>>>)
4. Testing the resolved code
5. Committing the resolution
additional_context: This is NOT related to TKT-007-V2, which is a documentation-only change. The TKT-007-V2 work is complete and correct. These merge conflicts are pre-existing in the main branch and affect all builds.
